Articles.Content:
Hi! Me again just was thinking about me running out of charge in my rockets, I thought of a challenge, I want you to post how much battery energy you can get into space my record is 42,576e post in the comments how much you get into space in one launch must be in a semi equatorial orbit and must be non modded batteries  pls don't put solar panels to recharge(cheatsy)

Edited March 18, 2016 by Crafting origins
Another challenge accepted! I'm just going to put a lot of battery's on my super super heavy lifter. If it can lift a 500 ton station why can't it lift this?
True true hope you can beat me
My brother just got 200010e into orbit:) 50 large batteries
